ygData.subject: Another limit
ygData.msgSnippet: I just discovered the limit where you can have free upgrades on armor for a slime.  It s 13372. After that point, armor doesn t cost anything for a slime.

I just discovered the limit where you can have "free" upgrades on 
armor for a slime.  It's 13372. After that point, armor doesn't cost 
anything for a slime.
